main event: Several objects were sighted at Walker AFB, Roswell, NM on 2 November 1957, with visual and radar observations.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 1.5 to 3 minutes., The objects left a light blue trail 300 to 900 yards in length., A second sighting showed the object as long and round, resembling horseshoe shape., The objects faded out at a 300-degree turn., Observers included military personnel with binocular assistance.
